property_guide.title: Property Guide
property_guide.desc: We provide you with tips, tools, and step-by-step guides on buying, selling, renting, and investing in real estate.
property_guide.mortgage_desc: Find the ideal mortgage, accurately calculate your monthly repayments, and easily determine your maximum affordability based on market interest rates and your financial situation.

property_guide_detail.title: Complete Property Guide
property_guide_detail.buying_desc: Buying a home is one of the most important investments in your life. This guide covers everything from budgeting to closing the deal.
property_guide_detail.selling_desc: Selling a property requires careful planning and preparation. Learn how to maximize your property's value and attract buyers.
property_guide_detail.renting_desc: Whether you are a tenant or a landlord, understanding the rental process is crucial. This guide covers all aspects of the rental market.
property_guide_detail.investing_desc: Property investment can yield high returns if done right. Learn about different investment strategies and how to build a profitable portfolio.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Cambodia Angkor Real Estate Co. Ltd (CARE) - Trusted, Professional, and Leading Real Estate Agency in Cambodia since 2002.
about.our_story_content1: Cambodia Angkor Real Estate Co. Ltd (CARE) was the first company of its kind to be licensed by the Royal Government of Cambodia. Our operator's license was granted on 8th January 2002 and a copy of the license is available for inspection on this web-site.
about.our_story_content2: The company has spent the last few years developing and improving its services and has grown to become one of the largest and most professional real estate companies within Cambodia. We are constantly striving to improve our customer care and to provide clear and concise advice about the domestic property market.
about.our_story_content3: We hope that the above information gives potential investors an idea of how Cambodia Angkor Real Estate Co. Ltd. conducts its business and that, knowing this, you will feel confident that your investment is in good hands.

service.agency_content: We provide assistance to clients seeking to purchase, sell, or rent of any kind of property in Cambodia through the country's most extensive and experienced sales network – one that covers every district of the Kingdom.
service.valuation_content: In a rapidly developing market like Cambodia, credible and strategic valuation services are vital measure taken by lenders to protect their own risk as well as to ensure they are not giving a loan greater than the value of the property or not lending against non-marketable one.
service.development_content: We aim to identify the intrinsic value of each property that we manage or design, and then execute a management plan that is best suited to that property.
service.investment_content: Our consultation services include all regulatory information as well as data on macroeconomic trends, industry and sector analysis and consumer trends.
service.citizenship_content: Due to the accelerating demand for visa and citizenship for foreign investors and other foreign nationals from every corner of the world.

about.vision_content: To be the most professional real estate agency in Cambodia and the fastest growing and successful agency in all of our branches nationwide.
about.mission_content: To provide excellent real-estate services in Cambodia by exceeding the expectations of our clients and by conducting business with honesty and integrity.
about.core_values_content: C-A-R-E places top priority on the integrity, not only of its products and services, but also its appreciation of local practices and legal requirements. The company conducts transparent business, is accountable for its actions and takes responsibility for its results. C-A-R-E has established a reputation as a highly reliable company by refusing to compromise its integrity in pursuit of profit. Integrity is the cornerstone of the company's most valuable intangible asset: Trust.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you with your real estate needs. Contact us for property inquiries, partnership opportunities, or any questions you may have!

mortgage_calculator.title: Mortgage Calculator
mortgage_calculator.subtitle: Calculate your monthly mortgage payments, total interest, and get tips for smart mortgage planning.
mortgage_calculator.tip_compare_rates: Compare Interest Rates: Shop around to find the best mortgage rates, as even a small difference can save you thousands over the loan term.
mortgage_calculator.tip_shorter_terms: Consider Shorter Terms: A shorter loan term (e.g., 15 years) often comes with lower interest rates and less total interest, though monthly payments will be higher.
mortgage_calculator.tip_budget_costs: Budget for Additional Costs: Factor in property taxes, insurance, and maintenance costs when planning your mortgage budget.
mortgage_calculator.tip_extra_payments: Make Extra Payments: Paying more than the minimum each month can reduce your principal faster and save on interest over time.
mortgage_calculator.tip_credit_score: Check Your Credit Score: A higher credit score can help you qualify for better mortgage rates, so review your score before applying.

agency_page.title: Our Agencies
agency_page.subtitle: Meet our trusted agency partners and find the right professionals to help with your real estate needs.

certificate_page.title: Our Certificates
certificate_page.subtitle: Browse our official company and professional certificates.
certificate_page.info1: Our certificates are <bold>official proof</bold> of our company's legitimacy, professional memberships, and the qualifications of our valuation experts.
certificate_page.info2: Certificates <bold>build trust</bold> with clients, partners, and banks, ensuring transparency and compliance with Cambodian regulations.
certificate_page.info3: Each certificate represents a <bold>milestone</bold> in our journey to provide reliable, expert real estate and valuation services.
certificate_page.info4: We are proud to display our credentials, so you can be <bold>confident</bold> in the quality and integrity of our work.

services_page.title: Our Services
services_page.subtitle: Discover the full range of real estate services we offer to help you succeed in Cambodia's property market.

agency.title: Real Estate Agency & Consultancy
agency.desc: Expert advice and support for buying, selling, and renting property in Cambodia, tailored to your needs.

valuation.title: Property Valuation
valuation.desc: Accurate, credible, and strategic valuation services for banks, investors, and individuals.

development.title: Property Development
development.desc: Comprehensive project management and development solutions for residential and commercial properties.

investment.title: Investment Funds Advisory
investment.desc: Strategic advice for real estate investment funds, including regulatory and market insights.

citizenship.title: Acquisition of Cambodian Citizenship
citizenship.desc: Expert guidance for foreign investors and individuals seeking Cambodian citizenship.

support.title: Client Support & Aftercare
support.desc: Ongoing support and aftercare for all clients, ensuring satisfaction and long-term success.

why.title: Complimentary Verbal Check Estimation
why.desc: Get a complimentary verbal check estimation form for quick insights into your property's value. Our standard valuation form will be promptly delivered at no cost.

why.title: Professional Indemnity Insurance
why.desc: We offer Professional Indemnity Insurance to safeguard our clients against financial losses resulting from any errors that may impact the value of the appraised property.

why.title: Expertise & Experienced Team
why.desc: With more than two decades of experience in the real estate sector, CARE has gained extensive understanding of market prices and trends as we have been through economic downturns and volatile real estate markets, equipping us to offer valuable insights and guidance to our clients.

why.title: Unparalleled Market Coverage
why.desc: With headquarters in Phnom Penh and satellite offices in key provinces and cities such as Siem Reap, Sihanoukville, and Battambang, CARE has a broad geographic reach across Cambodia swiftly.

why.title: Continuous Improvement & Innovation
why.desc: CARE is dedicated to staying at the forefront of industry trends and advancements, continuously investing in the system such as valuation report generation systems, ERP system as well as trainings and researching to enhance our capabilities and service offerings.

why.title: Objective & Independent Valuations
why.desc: As an independent valuation firm, CARE maintains strict adherence to professional standards and ethical guidelines in conducting valuations.

why.title: Timely & Reliable Results
why.desc: CARE is committed to delivering valuation reports promptly and efficiently, enabling clients to make timely and informed decisions.

hero.title: Contact Valuation Team
hero.subtitle: Message our valuation experts directly on Telegram for fast, professional support.

info.description: In a rapidly developing market like Cambodia, credible and strategic valuation services are vital measure taken by lenders to protect their own risk as well as to ensure they are not giving a loan greater than the value of the property or not lending against non-marketable one. Our nationwide valuation team examines each property and studies market trends as well as plans for new infrastructure and other developments that could affect (positively or negatively) the value of the property in the future. These insights have led to significant returns on investment for hundreds of clients. Our prompt, exceptionally accurate, honest and deeply knowledgeable valuation reports are supplied to local and international banks, individual clients and to court.

benefits.for_you_4: Peace of mind with expert guidance

process.title: Our Valuation Process
process.step_1: Initial consultation and property details collection
process.step_4: Delivery of a detailed, actionable valuation report
process.step_5: Follow-up support for any questions or clarifications

1.text: The valuation report was thorough and delivered quickly. It helped me secure a great deal on my property!
1.name: Mr. Chan Dara

2.text: Very professional team. They answered all my questions and the process was smooth from start to finish.
2.name: Ms. Srey Leak

3.text: Highly recommend! The valuation was accurate and the report was easy to understand.
3.name: Mr. Vannak

q1.question: How long does a valuation take?
q1.answer: Most valuations are completed within 2-3 business days after the property inspection.

q2.question: Is my information confidential?
q2.answer: Absolutely. All client information and reports are handled with strict confidentiality and professionalism.

q3.question: Can I use the valuation for a bank loan?
q3.answer: Yes, our reports are accepted by most local and international banks in Cambodia.

q4.question: How do I get started?
q4.answer: Simply contact our team via Telegram or fill out our online form, and we'll guide you through the process.
